text: وَٱلسَّارِقُ وَٱلسَّارِقَةُ فَٱقۡطَعُوٓاْ أَيۡدِيَهُمَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَسَبَا نَكَٰلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
translation: Uwivye, yaba umuhungu canke umukobwa, murabaca ibikonjo vyabo mwisunze ibwirizwa ry’Imana Allah, ni co gihano c’abivye ivya murundi badafiseko uburenganzira, cagenwe n’Imana Allah ku guhasha abasuma. Burya Imana Allah ni Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Intungane mu vyo Ikora;
